title: Viaje Interior
description:
🌐 Digital Textures: Episode #009 🌐

🔥 Today is the day! We are honored to present a new episode featuring Julian Ordoñez ✨🌊

“Sand Waves” – A Deep and Hypnotic Flow of Sound.
Inspired by artists like Guy J, Nicolas Rada, Michael A, Zankee Gulati, and Dmitry Molosh, this set captures the essence of progressive grooves, dark textures, and immersive rhythms that keep you moving without pause.

Each track is carefully selected to build a sonic atmosphere filled with energy and emotion — a seamless journey designed to transport you into a state of deep connection with the music.

title: Viaje Interior
description:
🌐 Digital Textures: Episode #008 🌐

🔥 Today is the day! We are honored to present a new episode featuring Kamyle (AR)! ✨🚀

“Viaje Interior” – A Sonic Journey Through the Mind and Soul.
Through emotive melodies and progressive rhythms, this set invites you to listen, enjoy, and elevate yourself. A carefully curated selection that blends energy and emotion in perfect harmony.
This Progressive House set is a sonic journey inspired by introspection and release.
Thank you for listening — I hope you enjoy it as much as I did recording it. – Kamyle (AR)

✨ Let yourself be carried away by this immersive experience: deep grooves, uplifting harmonies, and a musical flow designed to touch your inner world.

title: Untitled
description:
🌐 Digital Textures: Episode #007 🌐

🔥 Today is the day! We are honored to present a new episode featuring Max Carranza! 🎶✨

“For this set, I was inspired by the landscapes of the Patagonian steppe, the calm of quiet days, and the vastness of the horizon.” – Max Carranza

✨ A hypnotic and immersive progressive house set, designed to lose yourself in the sound and connect with the deepest emotions. Floating melodies, deep textures, and an emotional charge that flows through every beat.

title: Memories Series 001
description:
🌐 Digital Textures: Ep. #006 🌐

🔥 In our sixth episode, we welcome Sebastian Supital, who delivers a set full of immersive melodies, energy, and emotion. ✨ Through progressive sounds, "Memories Series" takes us on a musical journey where each track tells a story and evokes unique sensations. 🎶✨

💬 "This set aims to convey the sound that represents me the most: immersive, energizing melodies and music that sparks emotions. I hope you enjoy it!" — Sebastian Supital ✨

title: Cities of Life
description:
🌐 Digital Textures: Ep. #005🌐

🔥 In this episode, we present Rico Imer, a DJ with a solid trajectory in the underground scene. With a refined style and flawless mixing, he blends Deep Tech, Minimal, Deep House, Tech House, and Progressive into a unique sonic journey. 🎶✨

💬 ” ‘Cities of Life’ is inspired by that feeling of arriving in a new city at night—seeing the lights, the buildings, the people, and realizing that life is already in motion. While everyone follows their routine, you’re the stranger taking it all in. This set blends classic and contemporary sounds with modern harmonies to capture that essence. Hope you enjoy it!” — Rico Imer ✨

title: Secret Locations Fiji Guest Mix
description:
🌐 Digital Textures: Ep. #004 🌐

🔥 The moment has arrived. Secret Locations Fiji presents their exclusive set for Digital Textures, a selection that reflects over two decades of passion for Progressive House.

💬 "It is an honor to contribute this exclusive mix for Digital Textures. We believe in the importance of collaborating with platforms and people who share our passion, spreading the love for electronic music around the world. For this session, we drew inspiration from the Argentinian talents Paul Deep, John Cosani, and Matias Chilano, artists we consider to be among the most *underrated* in the Progressive House scene.
We hope you enjoy this journey as much as we enjoyed creating it. Gracias, Thank You & Vinaka Vaka Levu!!!" — Secret Locations Fiji 🎶✨

title: SMN
description:
🌐 Digital Textures: Ep. #003 🌐

🔥 In our third episode, we dive into the unique style of JulietEko, taking us on a sonic journey exploring downtempo, deep house, progressive, and more. 🎶✨

His set, titled SMN, features a selection that plays with different speeds and rhythm changes. In his spare time, JulietEko blends diverse genres like rock 'n' roll, reggae, pop, and rap from the '70s, '80s, '90s, and 2000s, creating sets full of emotion, movement, and dynamic sensations. 🎸🎤🎧

💬 "For this set, I was inspired to showcase some of the new music from late January and early February. I really enjoy creating different curves throughout the set, and I hope you like my selection." — JulietEko ✨

title: Pulse
description:
🌐 Digital Textures: Ep. #002 🌐

🔥 Our second episode called "Pulse" features the talent of ARiZ, a resident DJ of the channel, taking us on a sonic journey through deep and atmospheric sounds.

🎶✨ With a selection that blends deep house, melodic techno, progressive, and electronica, ARiZ draws inspiration from artists like Mr. G, Moodymann, Honey Dijon and Solomun to shape his musical identity.

💬 "This set is a space where the melodic and the progressive merge to create an immersive experience. I hope you enjoy it as much as I do." — ARiZ

title: Overture
description:
🌐 Digital Textures: Ep. #001 🌐

 Kicking off our series with our DJ resident J.C.V. and his intro set “Overture”—showcasing the deep and immersive sounds of Progressive house.

 “ i recorded this set inspired by the energy and landscapes of my beautiful city. Enjoy the journey. Much love!” — J.C.V.
